definitions.definition: To creep or go stealthily; to come or go while trying to avoid detection, as a person who does not wish to be seen.
definitions.example: He decided to sneak into the kitchen for a second cookie while his mom was on the phone.

definitions.definition: To take something stealthily without permission.
definitions.example: I went to sneak a chocolate but my dad caught me.
She asked me to sneak her a phone next month.

definitions.definition: To hide, especially in a mean or cowardly manner.
(with on) To inform an authority of another's misdemeanours.
definitions.example: If you sneak on me I'll bash you!
